thread.section_title: FlightHub Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FlightHub | flighthub.com
thread.title: Debra

author: Debra
title: Debra
text: Website easy to use. Customer service by telephone very good. I had to request a cancellation at six minutes after booking because I had made an error. The refund request was no problem and the money is on its way back to me. There was no problem and I was a little worried since this was the first time I had used this site. So I was pleasantly pleased. The money hasn't arrived yet but it is supposedly on his way
